name: GardenDefender (v2)
description:
This is the updated version! 

original Game: https://nightmatthias.itch.io/garden-vs-asteroids (WEB)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You play as a gardener but your garden got caught in a meteor shower. Equip the right tool at the tool stations and the right outfit at the tents. Replant the garden with new plants!

You lose if too many plants are lost!

Combinations:

Firefighter (red tent) + fire extinguisher = extinguish the fires / replant (seeds)

Pickaxe = destroy meteor

Farmer (yellow tent) + shovel = replant (debris)

Controlls:

- WASD: move

- Space: dash

- Scroll wheel: zoom in and out

- Q / Right mouse button: change Outfit or Tool at station

- E  /  Left mouse button: use tool

Assets used

- Kenney Game Assets

- Ultimate Sound FX Bundle
